MADRID GROUP

BUSINESS TRAVEL

28&30 September, 2019

Suggested Restaurants

September 28th

Main option: Cafe Gijon

Basic Menu

Aperitive
Oxtail croquettes

Starters to choose (in advance)
Albahaca salmorejo with tuna sashimi
or
Clams spanish style
or
Duck lasagna (with orange)
or
Tagliatelle salad with allioli, peppers and tuna.

Main course to choose (in advance)
Seafood-stuffed hake 
or
Iberica prey strips (Iberian pork)
or
Cordon-blue escalope

Dessert
White chocolate Pannacotta 

Drinks
Red or white wine (1 bottle each 3 pax) and water.

*Rates per person: 40€ VAT inc
+ 3€ if you want to add coffee


Alternative: La Mucca de Serrano

Basic Menu

To Share menu 

- New Pisco
- Spanish potatoes
- Homemade croquettes
- Nachos Teki
- Green salad
- Boletus pizza
- Curry chicken
- Fish and chips

Desserts

- Assortment of desserts

Drinks

- Red or white wine (1 bottle each 3 pax), water and coffee.
They can change wine per beer or soft drinks ( 1 bittle of wine = 2l beer or 4 soft drinks)

*Rates per person: 40€ VAT inc


September 30th

Main option: Sinsombrero

Basic Menu

Starters to shre
Russian salad with tuna
Iberic ham croquettes
Special pizza of picanha, red pesto, arugula and stracciatela.

Main course to choose
Roasted salmon with miso
or
Ox burguer with cheese and glazed shallots

Dessert
Chocolate cke with maracuya soup, crunchy honey and cookie ice cream.

*Rates per person: 37€ VAT inc
 + 3€ if you want to add coffee

Drink package option 1 - 12€

- 3 drinks (glass of wine, beer, water or soft drink)

Drink package option2 - 20€

- 2h open bar (wine, beer, juices, water and soft drinks)

Alternative: Sagardi Castellana

Basic Menu

8 pintxos + 2 drinks (2 glasses of wine or 2 beers or 2 soft drinks) + 2 sweets (per person)

*Pintxos to be chosen in advance*

*Rates per person: 34€ VAT inc
+ 3€ if you want to add coffee
